Package scrabble.network.host

package scrabble.network.host
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    ClientHandler is responsible for listening for new messages coming in from the clients It maintains a reference to the PartyHost to notify it when messages are received.
    PartyHost
    PartyHost receives messages from clients (via ClientHandler) and sends them to clients This class processes messages as needed depending on the type
    TileBag
